name: Rocket’s Entei ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Dark Condition
poke_body.effect: As long as Rocket’s Entei ex has any {D} Energy attached to it, Rocket’s Entei ex has no Weakness.

attacks.name: Energy Link
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Rocket’s Entei ex.

attacks.name: Volcanic Ash
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Rocket’s Entei ex and then choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 60 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
